question: How many Indian institutions were ranked in the top 100 of the QS World University Rankings by Subject 2021?
explanation:
In the QS World University Rankings by Subject 2021, only 12 Indian Institutions found place in the top-100 list.
Massachusetts Institute of Technology, USA has retained its top position. Three Indian Institutes of Technology have entered the group of the top 100 engineering institutes. IIT-Bombay is placed at the 49th position in the engineering and technology category.
